mapper.select: select tbl_booking.id, seatId, studyRoomId, buildingNum, classRoomNum, tbl_booking.startTime, bookingPeriod, stuNum, tbl_booking.state, opTime, detail from tbl_booking left join tbl_seat on tbl_booking.seatId = tbl_seat.id left join tbl_study_room on tbl_seat.studyRoomId = tbl_study_room.id where tbl_booking.id = #{id}

select tbl_booking.id, seatId, studyRoomId, buildingNum, classRoomNum, tbl_booking.startTime, bookingPeriod, stuNum, tbl_booking.state, opTime, detail from tbl_booking left join tbl_seat on tbl_booking.seatId = tbl_seat.id left join tbl_study_room on tbl_seat.studyRoomId = tbl_study_room.id where tbl_booking.state < 2

select tbl_booking.id, seatId, studyRoomId, buildingNum, classRoomNum, tbl_booking.startTime, bookingPeriod, stuNum, tbl_booking.state, opTime, detail from tbl_booking left join tbl_seat on tbl_booking.seatId = tbl_seat.id left join tbl_study_room on tbl_seat.studyRoomId = tbl_study_room.id where stuNum = #{stuNum}
